weapon_description: This polearm was once jointly forged by the craftsmen in the mines as a sacrifice to the spirits of the mountains.
weapon_skill_description: Decreases Climbing Stamina Consumption by 15% and increases Elemental Skill DMG by 24%. Also, after other nearby party members use Elemental Skills, the equipping character's Elemental Skill DMG will also increase by 24% for 8s.
